items.headline: United Airlines’ best loyalty perks will soon be reserved for its cardholders. Is the card worth it?
items.summary_en: Frequent flyers who hold a United Airlines co-branded credit or debit card can soon earn up to twice as many miles as noncardholders, effectively rewarding the airline’s biggest spenders.

items.headline: I’m 72 and started claiming Social Security at 69. Will I get more money if I work part-time?
items.summary_en: The Social Security Administration requires 40 credits to qualify for benefits and calculates your benefit using your highest 35 years of earnings.
